meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Zach Dark Ashley O'Mara Mark Ashton Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7716.

td.p: Zach Dark, an investment analyst from Hoover, Alabama
Ashley O'Mara, a Ph.D. candidate and teaching associate from Baldwinsville, New York
Mark Ashton, a software engineer from Elmhurst, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $29,100)

tr.td: THE 7 ANCIENT WONDERS
THIS IS NOT A DRILL (OR IS IT?)
REVERSIBLE COMPOUND WORDS
(Alex: Boathouse, houseboat. There's an example for you.)
"M"TERTAINMENT
BEAUTY TRENDS
QUOTH THE AMENDMENT
